### Feature

**As a** [some role]  
**I need** [some functionality]  
**So that** [some benefit]  

### Details & Assumptions

* [document what you know]

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Given [some initial state]
When [some event]
Then [some measurable outcome]
```
